2012.gada Londonas Olimpiskās spēles. Basketbola fināls vīriešiem. ASV - Spānija
Alien Deep with Bob Ballard
programme.desc: Oceanographer Dr. Robert Ballard is on a global quest to unravel one of the world's biggest mysteries – where life on Earth began. Ballard suspects life may have gotten started where hot rock and water collide in one of the world's most seemingly hostile environments – active volcanoes deep within the ocean. He tracks teams of scientists as they deploy robotic submersibles at deep sea volcanic rifts across the world's oceans, points his own ship to a dangerous undersea volcano in the Mediterranean, and hunts for answers amid hissing sulfur vents in Iceland and bubbling beakers at a NASA laboratory. Could the seething geologic heart of our planet actually have given birth to life on Earth?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Taking off during a major storm, a brand-new 737 falls from the sky over West Africa, and an international group of investigators soon descends on Cameroon. Submerged in mud and water, Kenya Airlines Flight 507 crashed into a mangrove swamp, killing everyone on board. And while investigators ultimately pinpoint one fatal mistake that triggered the tragedy, they also uncover a lethal cascade of issues that sent the passenger jet spiralling toward the ground.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Banged Up Abroad is a British docudrama television series following stories of people who have been arrested while travelling abroad. It seems like you are watching a blood-freezing thriller, except for it is based on real events and real people. You'll see how a trip to paradise can turn into hell and end up in prison in an unknown country and it will make your hair stand. People get into troubles for trying to smuggle drugs, sometimes they are kidnapped or captured. The series is a mixture of interviews with the real people and actors reconstructing the events. We find out what it is like to be in prison abroad, without help and money, not knowing the language, and what are the terrible consequences for the family members. The series is a warning for all careless tourists, it shows vividly how easy and fast it is to hit rock bottom.

programme.title: Hindenburg: The New Evidence
programme.desc: Shot by amateur photographer Harold Schenck and never seen by government investigators in 1937, Hindenburg has remained essentially unknown until recently. The stunning footage of the Hindenburg's final moment starts earlier than in the other famous newsreel films – and it was shot from an entirely new angle that shows the entire length and breadth of the eight-hundred-foot-long airship. It's also the only known footage of the Hindenburg in the air before it crashes in flames. A team of crash investigators, historians, and scientists has come together to reexamine the case of the airship Hindenburg with the new film evidence in hand.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: DRAIN THE OCEAN pulls the plug on the ocean to reveal hidden secrets and lost worlds, using ground-breaking technology, breath-taking photography and insight from top marine archaeologists. The series delivers penetrating new insights into the epic history of human civilisation and the deep history of Planet Earth itself, exposing sunken cities, shipwrecks and the amazing natural wonders of the deep.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Ever wonder how chocolaty Easter crème eggs get to the masses, or how flaky kosher salt is made? Uncover the manufacturing secrets of some of Canada's favourite foods in fascinating new series 'Food Factory'. Behind each bag of crisps, can of beer, bar of chocolate, and loaf of bread is a mega-industrial production line that brings each product to the masses. Going behind the scenes, each episode delves into four made-in-Canada products, presenting a first hand, step-by-step look at the anatomy of how each morsel is made, and what ingredients and techniques go into making them. From pesto to pasta; chewing gum to Canadian whiskey, explore the weird and wonderful processes that transform fresh ingredients into everyone's favourite foods.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how sweet and crunchy Boston Baked Beans are made to be the candy version of a traditional side dish; the tangy strawberry filling in a Welch's fruit yogurt snack receives a creamy coating; brocato, a decadently cheesy Scottish breakfast pie, gets its signature stand up pastry shell; and Kerr's infuses their irresistible peppermint chocolate candies with an authentically spicy flavour. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Head-butting may be acceptable among rams and goats, but for humans its a little more painful. Plates, cans, watermelons…some people dont seem to know when to stop challenging the thickness of their skull. Ice-skating can be so fraught with risks that its often best to just focus on staying upright and moving forwards. With so many techniques to master, practice really makes perfect. But at what point does perseverance become torture?

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is a whacky British science show that looks at some of the most watched videos on the internet and explains the science behind them. Initially hosted by Top Gear's Richard Hammond, and later by Dallas Campbell, this National Geographic is a comedic gem. With the first series airing episodes titled Cannon Ball Ice Dude, Learning to Fly, Jet Pack Failure and Dancing Disaster, you can guarantee that this is one of the most ridiculous shows on television. What more could you want?

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. Vive la France! This week the teams go all continental as they look to buy and break a car that was designed and built in France. Ben and Frankie embrace the Gallic theme, as they travel to Northern France to check out a rusting Citroen DS. George and Sheldon stay a bit closer to home but are still able to pick up the equally iconic Citroen Dyane a descendant of the Citroen 2CV.

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond stands atop on the Wembley roof, in front of its record breaking arch to discover the Engineering Connections behind the new high tech home of English football. Richard reveals how the architects and engineers, under pressure to maintain Wembley's iconic status as a world class sporting and music venue, drew inspiration from a rock climbing knot, the first glider to carry a man, a high powered medieval crossbow, stealth aircraft technology and Archimedes' buoyancy theory that surfaced over two thousand years ago.

programme.title: Megabridges
programme.desc: Witness one of the greatest bridge-building booms of all time. Three ultimate bridges call China their home: The Lupu is the longest arch bridge in the world; the Runyang is the largest suspension bridge in China (third longest in the world) and the Sutong is soon to be the longest cable-stayed bridge in the world. Tall enough to straddle huge cargo ships and strong enough to withstand powerful earthquakes and typhoon-force winds, these bridges aren´t anything but mega. But to build these structures engineers have to overcome enormous challenges. They battle floods, unstable soil, strong currents, and potential ship collision. See the amazing solutions they must devise to construct three of the world´s most astonishing Mega Bridges.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Making motoring dreams come true for a fifth season Car SOS is back, and this time it's bigger and better than ever. Everyone's favourite petrol heads Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw continue their mission to seek out classic cars with deserving owners. Using all their guile and restoration knowledge their aim is to sneak away clapped out classics without their owners knowing then in a blizzard of grease and grime and hard graft get the much loved motors back where they deserve to be, on the road. In this series the boys take on their biggest challenges ever. Chronic rust, hard to find parts and broken engines test the boys to their limits. British classics, Italian roadsters, German grand tourers and French hot hatches from across seven decades of motoring history make the most astonishing line-up Car SOS has ever had, and, for their lucky owners the surprise they will never forget.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: DRAIN THE OCEAN pulls the plug on the ocean to reveal hidden secrets and lost worlds, using ground-breaking technology, breath-taking photography and insight from top marine archaeologists. The series delivers penetrating new insights into the epic history of human civilisation and the deep history of Planet Earth itself, exposing sunken cities, shipwrecks and the amazing natural wonders of the deep.

programme.title: Hindenburg: The New Evidence
programme.desc: Shot by amateur photographer Harold Schenck and never seen by government investigators in 1937, Hindenburg has remained essentially unknown until recently. The stunning footage of the Hindenburg's final moment starts earlier than in the other famous newsreel films – and it was shot from an entirely new angle that shows the entire length and breadth of the eight-hundred-foot-long airship. It's also the only known footage of the Hindenburg in the air before it crashes in flames. A team of crash investigators, historians, and scientists has come together to reexamine the case of the airship Hindenburg with the new film evidence in hand.

programme.title: Cosmos: Possible Worlds
programme.desc: The human understanding of the universe is very limited but there is one man who believes that our future is greater than anyone thought possible. Neil deGrasse Tyson explores how we could look at space and space travel in the near and distant future, discussing our discovery of the laws of nature and how to find our exact coordinates in the universe. From our own planet we will take a journey through our solar system, galaxy and beyond to seek answers as to whether human habitation is possible on other planets and if there is, possibly, intelligent alien life already out there. The Cosmos is vast and holds endless answers yet even more questions. Asking those questions is only the beginning. Documentary series.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Single mother Heather Ebling desperately needs a break, and when work colleague Danny invites her to Colombia, she jumps at the chance. But the trip soon turns sour and Heather must head to the airport disappointed. Then when drugs are found in Danny's luggage Heather is also arrested and sent to a notorious jail. There the ever-present threat of violence becomes too much to bear and she has a nervous breakdown. Now Heather realises she must fight to survive.

programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: This season features four episodes each at two of Latin America's biggest airports: Lima, Peru's Jorge Chavez and Brazil's S?o Paulo-Guarulhos. Police are on high alert. Their main challenges: illegal immigration and the trafficking of cocaine. From hidden compartments and ingested capsules to fake documents, officers work 24/7 to protect their borders and stop criminals in their tracks. Watch the action from behind the scenes.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With Brazil's Chapecoense soccer team on board, LaMia Flight 2933 is on its final approach to Medellin, Columbia when the crew suddenly declares a fuel emergency. Before air traffic control even has time to clear a path, the plane crashes on the crest of a mountain, killing nearly everyone on board. With the soccer world in mourning, investigators face incredible pressure to figure out what happened. And as they pore over the evidence, they uncover a disturbing tale of greed and a deadly gamble.

programme.title: Hindenburg: The New Evidence
programme.desc: Shot by amateur photographer Harold Schenck and never seen by government investigators in 1937, Hindenburg has remained essentially unknown until recently. The stunning footage of the Hindenburg's final moment starts earlier than in the other famous newsreel films – and it was shot from an entirely new angle that shows the entire length and breadth of the eight-hundred-foot-long airship. It's also the only known footage of the Hindenburg in the air before it crashes in flames. A team of crash investigators, historians, and scientists has come together to reexamine the case of the airship Hindenburg with the new film evidence in hand.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay's quest to master the world's most fascinating cuisines lands him on the Indonesian island of Sumatra where he risks his safety and his pride to acquire the ingredients he needs. Whether working as a deckhand in the open ocean, exploring a daunting cave system, milking buffalo or being dragged behind them, Gordon's commitment to world-class cooking is put to the test. With Indonesia's own top chef, William Wongso looking over his shoulder, the pressure is high.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls
programme.desc: Bear Grylls inspires Rainn Wilson to work for it by having him search for hidden caches in the aspen forest and alpine terrain of the La Sal mountains in a time-tested method of mountaineering training. Bear pushes Rainn to the limits of his endurance with dangerous rappels and dizzying climbs, but it's not until they fish for food that things take a revealing turn in what is definitely the most naked RUNNING WILD in the history of the show!

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Just as LAPA Flight 3142 lifts off from a single runway airport in Buenos Aires, the 737 starts shaking violently, and moments later it crashes back to the ground. Hurtling forward at 160 knots, the plane careens past the airport perimeter, crosses a busy highway, and bursts into flames. The disaster leaves an entire nation stunned, but nothing prepares Argentinians for the staggering blunder that caused it.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: Lawless Island is a series focusing on a group of people who have chosen a new life far away in Alaska. United by their extreme independence and love of the wild, the show's characters have left civilized way of life behind. Now they have to deal with many different things common people do not encounter in there every day routine, like hunting and stocking the freezers, fishing, farming in order to survive. It makes them realize how dependable they are on each other.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: Lawless Island is a series focusing on a group of people who have chosen a new life far away in Alaska. United by their extreme independence and love of the wild, the show's characters have left civilized way of life behind. Now they have to deal with many different things common people do not encounter in there every day routine, like hunting and stocking the freezers, fishing, farming in order to survive. It makes them realize how dependable they are on each other.

programme.title: Alaska: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next generation of Alaskans play by their own rules, rebelling against society norms and surviving Arctic climates. Michael Manzo travels nomadically in search of opportunity. Alex Javor leaves life in Virginia behind to build his dream cabin. The Rowlands instill critical lessons of survival to their children. And Brent and Ida work 24/7 on their business while navigating life as a new couple.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Master mechanics Fuzz Townshend and parts-blagging petrol head Tim Shaw are back for a brand new season of the fan favourite show Car S.O.S. The comedy duo have their work-cut out as they embark on more undercover missions rescuing classic cars and returning them in a surprise reveal to their much deserving owners. This season starts with a exhaust bang, as Tim and Fuzz are on a special mission to rescue a unique classic racing car and reunite it with a true racing legend...Sir Stirling Moss! But this 1962 Austin Healy Sebring Sprite, that once raced in a team that included Sir Stirling Moss, isn't in a fit state. But the guys have a plan to get this car back on the racetrack and Sir Stirling Moss back in the driving seat. Fuzz begins work in the garage whilst Tim goes in search of the original engine, and also finding time along the way to have a sit down with the racing legend himself. Will the Sprite be ready in time for Sir Stirling Moss to take it out for a spin? The guys also come across a supercar that's begging to be taken back to the swinging '60s, the Jaguar E-type. But the car's owner Mick is suffering from osteoporosis and has lost all hope that his beloved car will ever be back to its full glory. But Tim and Fuzz are working with Mick's family in secret to restore the car and give Mick a brilliant surprise. But when they discover it's a back to metal restoration this car looks like it's going to be more of a head-ache than a head-turner. Other cars festering away waiting for the guy's attention are Tim's all-time favourite: the Audi Quattro Turbo, the 3 wheeled 1934 Morgan F4, a retro 1982 Mk1 GTI and a 1995 Nissan Skyline GTR. So start up those engines, as Tim and Fuzz return this month for the ultimate car show with a heart.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: The band's instruments get stolen, so they hold a rummage sale to raise money to replace them. When Tomika sells a sentimental item of Summer's, she has to remember why it was so important to repair their friendship.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: In Blue's Clues & You, beloved puppy Blue invites viewers to join her and Josh on a clue-led adventure to solve a puzzle. With each paw print, the viewer is inspired to interact with Josh and Blue to figure out Blue's Clues!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After a pun-filled trip to the grocery store with Luan and Lola, Dad worries Lola thinks he plays favorites. When Lynn's friend Margo is celebrated for a one-ina-million soccer goal, Lynn has to try and be supportive.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Hoping to get closer to her crush, Benny, Luan tries out for the school play. When Clyde and schoolmate Zach begin bonding over a mutual interest in antiques, Lincoln quickly finds himself feeling like a third wheel.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: The Harper quads make a deal with their rivals, the Kramden quads, that those who make the better group picture, get to use the hashtag ''quadgoals''. To make the best pic, Nicky, Ricky, Dicky, Dawn and their parents, go to their Aunt Jackie's farm. Aunt Jackie shows them a set of butter sculptures that look exactly like quads, and that she made for an art contest. In their quest for obtaining the best photo, quads will ruin Jackie's chances for winning.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Young Dylan's grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son's family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad meet an impressive family they worry their kids aren't doing enough to ensure successful futures. Tired of Lynn's poor sportsmanship during board games, the siblings decide to team up to take her down.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The sisters enlist the "Master of Convincing" (AKA Lincoln) to teach them how to ask Mom and Dad for money. Lisa gets her report card and finds she's failed ''social skills''. To bring up her grade, she must make a friend.

programme.title: City Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to LEGO City. A modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many BLOCKHEADS. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack
programme.desc: Ollie's Pack is an animated comedy about Ollie, a 13-year old boy who, with the help of his best buddies Cleo and Bernie and monster trainer Captain Wowski, protects and controls a backpack portal to the world of monsters.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln wishes he had ten brothers instead of ten sisters, and Lisa gives him a glimpse into that reality. Lola wants to be a part of the siblings' secrets club, but they won't let her in because she's a "tattle tale".

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Jautā – Jums
programme.desc: Atkārtojums. Raidījumu "Jautā-Jums" skaties katru darba dienu plkst. 16.00. Raidījumu vada Lauris Kļaviņš.

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: Парижские тайны
programme.desc: Исторический триллер о загадочных убийствах в самом романтичном городе мира. Париж, конец XIX века. По городу прокатывается серия загадочных убийств в самых известных и культурно значимых местах города: кабаре Мулен Руж, Парижская опера, Эйфелева башня… Смотрите детективный сериал с французским колоритом.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Пападос-шоу

В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. programme.title: Когда мы дома
programme.desc: Об эволюции семейных отношений – от начала совместной жизни и до старости. Главные герои – пять украинских семейных пар разного возраста и степени развития отношений, которые не знакомы между собой. События в комедийном сериале разворачиваются в стенах квартир, в которых проживают пары, и построены на коротких историях из семейной жизни.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Персонажами шоу становятся обычные врачи и больные, ГАИшники и нарушители, родители и дети, полицейские и хулиганы, пилоты и стюардессы, офисные работники и даже стриптизёрши.

programme.title: Инспектор Купер
programme.desc: В Арсенале, одном из промышленных районов российской глубинки, живет Алексей Куприянов по прозвищу Купер. Его жизнь меняется после убийства друга — чтобы вести собственное расследование, и капитан Куприянов уходит из оперативного отдела, и становится участковым инспектором. В Арсенале все ему свое, родное: и бывшая жена со своими проблемами, и сын в переходном возрасте, и девушки-красавицы, и местные жители, которые обращаются к нему за помощью, и даже бандиты, терроризирующие городок. Но Купер не из робких, и точно знает, как со всем этим справиться…

programme.title: Дорожные войны
programme.desc: Ежедневно сотрудники ГИБДД становятся участниками настоящих ожесточенных дорожных войн. Они в курсе всех происшествий, которые происходят на трассах России, и изо всех сил стараются вовремя догнать преступника и призвать его к уголовной ответственности. Каждая подобная операция балансирует на грани жизни и смерти, справедливости и безнаказанности. Программа позволит посмотреть на самые запоминающиеся случаи на дороге. Эта передача придется по душе всем поклонникам динамичных погонь и автомобильных преследований. Все события происходят на бешеной скорости, нужно смотреть в оба, чтобы догнать виновного, но при этом самому не навлечь на себя опасность. Пронзительный вой мигалок и скрежет асфальта под колесами разбушевавшихся автомобилей — этого будет вдоволь в каждом выпуске. Программа Дорожные войны основывается исключительно на достоверных источниках. Сюжет всегда подтверждается записями видеорегистраторов свидетелей, самих нарушителей либо сотрудников правоохранительных органов. Иногда им удается запечатлеть просто невероятные моменты, которые по увлекательности не уступают даже популярным боевикам. Увидев качество их работы, количество нарушающих правила дорожного движения просто обязано сократиться.

programme.title: Инспектор Купер
programme.desc: В Арсенале, одном из промышленных районов российской глубинки, живет Алексей Куприянов по прозвищу Купер. Его жизнь меняется после убийства друга — чтобы вести собственное расследование, и капитан Куприянов уходит из оперативного отдела, и становится участковым инспектором. В Арсенале все ему свое, родное: и бывшая жена со своими проблемами, и сын в переходном возрасте, и девушки-красавицы, и местные жители, которые обращаются к нему за помощью, и даже бандиты, терроризирующие городок. Но Купер не из робких, и точно знает, как со всем этим справиться…

programme.title: Морские дьяволы
programme.desc: В сериале идёт рассказ о работе и взаимоотношениях членов специального подразделения. Его сформировали из лучших обученных бойцов для возможности вести бои во всех трёх ипостасях: на морских, земных и воздушных просторах. Их группа состоит из четвёрки отважных людей, каждый из которой способен работать за всех остальных. Их стали все и повсеместно называть "морскими дьяволами" ведь основные миссии, ставящие перед ними, связаны именно с водной стихией. Пока ещё не было перед ними поставлено такой задачи, которая стала неподвластной этой четвёрке. Каждый из них уникален по-своему и хоть они очень разные, но придерживаются одной цели – всегда с честью подходить к выполнению профессионального долга.

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч. Судьбы
programme.desc: "Смерчи" вновь действуют, и вновь – по одному. Новые отдельные фильмы о жизни героев – Бати, Багиры, Кота, Бизона, Физика, Муры и Пригова, в которых каждый отвечает сам за себя – в отпуске, на специальном задании или под прикрытием – словом тогда, когда коллег по Смерчу рядом нет, и надеяться, кроме самих себя, не на кого.

programme.title: Пёс
programme.desc: Макс – алкоголик. Когда-то лучший сыщик в городе, Макс потерял все – работу, друзей, жену. У него остался единственный друг – Пес. После серии погонь, драк и перестрелок, Пес и Макс раскрыли тайну загадочного убийства.

programme.title: Брат за брата
programme.desc: Такие кварталы, как Гарлем, раньше можно было увидеть только в голливудских боевиках. Никто не думал, что они могут появиться и у нас. Гарлем – настоящее гетто в одном из крупных российских городов. Здесь почти открыто торгуют наркотиками и перепродают краденое. Школьные учителя боятся своих учеников, ведь те способны убить за плохую оценку. Местные стражи правопорядка не рискуют в позднее время суток лишний раз появляться на его улицах, а жители так привыкли к установленным правилам игры, что кажется, ничто и никогда не сможет заставить их иначе смотреть на происходящее вокруг.

programme.title: Izvēlies panākumus
programme.desc: Izvēlies panākumus un uzzini visu par studijām Latvijas Universitātē!

programme.title: Ziņu TOP
programme.desc: Raidījumā katru darba dienu tiek apkopotas svarīgākās dienas tēmas un komentētas kopā ar raidījuma vadītāju un dienas viesi.

programme.title: Vēlais ar Streipu
programme.desc: Ikdienas satīrisko ziņu vakara šovs ar Kārli Streipu, kurā tiek apskatītas un analizētas dažādas sabiedrībā aktuālas tēmas.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Philippe Cousteau Jr., grandson of the legendary Jacques Cousteau, explores the most breath-taking places on the earth. Documentary TV series Xploration Awesome Planet takes you on incredible journey around our unique planet to experience its outstanding power and beauty. Philippe uses unbeatable combination of passion, deep knowledge and infectious enthusiasm to show us dynamic forces of earth, its miraculous wonders from the tops of the highest mountains to the depths of the oceans, various ecosystems, extreme weather, waterfalls and caves, geisers and glaciers, volcanoes and beaches of all colors of rainbow, various species of animals and birds and their habitats.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: Super Human Challenge
programme.desc: Children's series. Join presenter Tim Fitzhigham as he scours the world for people with astonishing abilities and real life super powers. With help from his assistant Doctor Megan John, Tim challenges these extraordinary individuals to see just how super-human they are. From the arctic to the bottom of the ocean, Tim leaves no stone left unturned, and in his quest for super humans, he manages to find a man who can see with his ears! Prepare to be astounded as these science-defying men and women leave Tim lost for words. With extraordinary physical abilities and unbelievable stamina, Tim will need to all the help he can get from Doctor Megan if he is to stand a chance against these incredible human beings.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: It's My Party
programme.desc: From Diwali, the Hindu festival of lights to Hanukkah to Kwanzaa to Mexico's Day of the Dead, viewers are taken on a fascinating journey of discovery into different cultural celebrations seen from a kid's perspective. Each episode pairs up two kids who have never met; one acts as the party host introducing the other, their VIP guest, to their family's cultural celebration. The two newfound friends jump in feet first, exploring the origins and meaning behind the traditions, participating in a series of challenges and games linked to the food, fashion and festivities of the dynamic celebrations, which culminate in a lively performance by both kids.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli, MIT Engineer and astronautics expert takes viewers on incredible journeys through space. She visits various NASA facilities, private space companies, and interviews space experts in search of answers about our universe.

programme.title: Fierce Earth
programme.desc: A rumble in the earth, tsunami in the sea, or twister moving in... these catastrophic events in nature have destructive outcomes, and this is the story of the devastation they leave. The Fierce Earth team are here to take a look at some of our planets most powerful forces, why they happen and the results of their occurrence. See shocking footage of avalanches, lighting strikes, wildfires and hurricanes, and learn how you can stay as safe as possible in the event of one of Earths fiercest natural events.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. Narrated by Steve Backshall, follow the children as they learn about the incredible animals and extraordinary plants that are in danger of being lost from the planet.

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.title: Grappling LT. Jaunimo čempionatas, Ukmergė, trečia laida
Čempionų kelias. Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Vitorijos "Baskonia" – Barselonos "Barca"
Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Antros rungtynės

Penktasis kėlinys. Endesa krepšinio lygos apžvalga
One Championship on TNT I. Mišrių kovos menų čempionatas
Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei
programme.desc: SPORT1 televizija kartu su Sporto rėmimo fondu pristatė projektą "Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei 2020", kurio metu siekiama į aktyvų laisvalaikį įtraukti net tuos vaikus, kurie vietoje fizinio aktyvumo renkasi žalingus įpročius ar net netinkamą veiklą.

programme.title: Čempionų kelias. Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Vitorijos "Baskonia" – Barselonos "Barca"
One Championship on TNT I. Mišrių kovos menų čempionatas
Copes garša
programme.desc: Cope ir hobijs, bauda, prieks, emociju gamma no veiksmes līdz neveiksmei un atkal otrādi. Tā ved ārpus mājas, dabā, tā sagādā piedzīvojumus vienatnē vai kopā ar draugiem, tā rosina sajūtas, atpūtina ķermeni un prātu un bagātina dzīves "garšu"! "Copes Garša" ir informatīvi izglītojošs raidījums internetā Youtube kanālā, Facebook profilā un makšķernieku foruma mājaslapā copeslietas.lv. Raidījuma "Copes Garša" mērķis ir ar makšķernieku sabiedrībā zināmu sportistu paraugu popularizēt makšķerēšanu kā mūsdienīga, aktīva un veselīga dzīvesveida sastāvdaļu un aizraujošu sporta aktivitāti, vienlaikus piesaistot attiecīgos speciālistus, informēt un izglītot Latvijas makšķerniekus, sevišķi jauno paaudzi, par atbildīgas, saimnieciskas, saudzīgas un ilgstpējīgas zivju resursu izmantošanas pamatprincipiem, dabas aizsardzību un līdzdalību tās resursu saglabāšanā un atjaunošanā.

programme.title: Raidījums "Rīta mikslis Liepājā", atk.; "Ērģeļmūzikas dienasgrāmata", atk.
Пираньи Неаполя
programme.desc: Они еще очень молоды, но уже смертельно опасны, ведь только самые дерзкие могут стать новыми королями преступного мира Неаполя. Их легко заметить по дорогой одежде, татуировкам и холодному взгляду, когда они прорезают плотный поток машин на скутерах. Их дружба и честь проверяется в уличных перестрелках. Они живут на полную, но готовы убивать и умирать за свою мечту о власти, деньгах и любви…

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Она довольно быстро зарабатывает себе репутацию отличного специалиста, оказываясь одной из самых ценных сотрудниц банка Deutsche Invest. Но беда в том, что финансовая организация, в которой она работала раньше, конкурирует с нынешней, и девушка оказывается целью шантажа бывшего начальника.

programme.title: Анархисты
programme.desc: Париж, 1899 год. Выросший в нищете сирота, а ныне командир отделения жандармерии Жан Альбертини должен проникнуть в группу анархистов. Для него это реальная возможность подняться по карьерной лестнице. Но чем дальше, тем больше у него возникает сомнений. По мере того как Жан составляет полицеские рапорты на преступную группировку для своего начальника Гаспара, он сам начинает все больше симпатизировать им.

programme.title: Синоби
programme.desc: 1614 год. Япония объединилась под властью первого сёгуна Токугавы. Генносукэ из клана Кога и Оборо из клана Ига остаются последней надеждой двух деревень, разрываемых трагедией беспрерывной мести. Их благословенная любовь должна принести мир страдающим ниндзя, населяющим деревни. Однако, заговор Токугавы снова сеет вражду между ними. Генносукэ выступает в защиту мира, а Оборо выбирает сражение как средство разрешения конфликтов. И теперь, когда им предстоит встретиться в качестве врагов, смогут ли они сохранить свою божественную любовь?

programme.title: Белая свадьба
programme.desc: Матильда – трудный подросток с неустойчивой психикой, которая делает шатким и весь мир вокруг. Задача Франсуа – ее умудренного опытом и летами педагога по философии – проста и очевидна: вернуть девушку в цивилизованное общество, к устоявшимся нормам, ввести ее в круг хрестоматийных ценностей. Он думал, что ступает по податливому песку, в то время как сделал шаг прямо на гребень волны. Вспыхнувшая между ними страсть таила огромную разрушительную силу. И когда Франсуа решил отступить, спрятаться за семьей и обычной жизнью, Матильда преградила ему дорогу...

programme.title: Пираньи Неаполя
programme.desc: Они еще очень молоды, но уже смертельно опасны, ведь только самые дерзкие могут стать новыми королями преступного мира Неаполя. Их легко заметить по дорогой одежде, татуировкам и холодному взгляду, когда они прорезают плотный поток машин на скутерах. Их дружба и честь проверяется в уличных перестрелках. Они живут на полную, но готовы убивать и умирать за свою мечту о власти, деньгах и любви…

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Она довольно быстро зарабатывает себе репутацию отличного специалиста, оказываясь одной из самых ценных сотрудниц банка Deutsche Invest. Но беда в том, что финансовая организация, в которой она работала раньше, конкурирует с нынешней, и девушка оказывается целью шантажа бывшего начальника.

programme.title: Не оглядывайся
programme.desc: Жанна – писательница, замужем, имеет двоих детей. Она начинает замечать тревожащие её изменения в доме. Её тело начинает меняться. Но никто вокруг неё, кажется, этого не замечает. Семья списывает страхи Жанны на стресс, связанный с выходом её новой книги, но сама она понимает, что что-то другое, более глубокое и волнующее имеет место. Увиденное на фотографии побуждает Жанну отправиться в Италию на поиски одной женщины. И там, преобразовавшись в другую женщину, РозаМарию, она наконец-то поймёт странный секрет её истинной сущности.

programme.title: Ассистентка
programme.desc: Джейн мечтает о карьере продюсера. Она устраивается на работу в преуспевающую кинокомпанию в качестве помощницы владельца. Однако вместо радужных перспектив ее ждет мучительная офисная рутина, плохо скрываемая враждебность коллег и постоянные упреки шефа. Джейн закрывает глаза на все, что творится за закрытыми дверями начальственного кабинета. Ей приходится быть как все, но лишь до поры до времени.

programme.title: Жюль и Джим
programme.desc: В начале ХХ века в Париже дружили два товарища — австриец Жюль и француз Джим. Гуляли, разговаривали, разминались в спортзале, обсуждали знакомых девушек, с которыми сентиментальному белокурому Жюлю везло меньше, чем Джиму, а счастья хотелось обоим. А потом в их жизнь вошла роковая женщина — Катрин. Жюль влюбляется и просит Джима не быть помехой его роману с девушкой. Но не все так просто. Катрин ведет себя так, будто в ее груди бьются два сердца, и одним она пламенно любит Жюля, а вторым — с не меньшей страстью Джима.

programme.title: Мужчины и цыплята
programme.desc: Габриэль и Элиас — братья, но очень разные. Первый — измученный профессор, написавший книгу о смысле жизни, а второй одержим женщинами, но никогда не пользуется у них популярностью, поэтому часто довольствуется собственной персоной. Однажды отец братьев умирает и оставляет видеокассету, из которой они узнают шокирующую правду — они не родные братья, у них разные матери, а настоящий их отец живет неподалеку. Габриэль с Элиасом отправляются на его поиски и вскоре встречают остальных братьев — Франца, Йозефа и Грегора, которые живут в поместье, а их отец всё время спит. Усадьба полна загадок, и братьям предстоит узнать весьма неприятную правду.

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте.
